advancements.projecte.alch_bag.descripti: All the wonders of an alchemical chest, in your pocket.
Stuffing matter together. Because that's a good idea.
advancements.projecte.dark_matter_furnac: A furnace is even better when made from dark matter.
advancements.projecte.klein_star.descrip: Storing EMC for a rainy day.
advancements.projecte.klein_star_big.des: Holding the universe in your pocket.
advancements.projecte.philo_stone.descri: Let's get things started! Craft a philosopher's stone
advancements.projecte.red_matter.descrip: The space time continuum may be broken.
advancements.projecte.relay.description: Linking collectors together for even more power.
advancements.projecte.transmutation_tabl: And then you thought things couldn't get better.
command.projecte.clear_knowledge.notify: Your transmutation knowledge was cleared by %1$s!
command.projecte.dump_missing_emc.multip: %1$s Items are missing an EMC value, printing to client log.
command.projecte.dump_missing_emc.none_m: All Items have an EMC value.
command.projecte.dump_missing_emc.one_mi: One Item is missing an EMC value, printing to server log.
command.projecte.emc.invalid: The value "%1$s" is invalid, it must be a positive integer.
command.projecte.emc.invalid_item: Error: The item or tag "%1$s" was not found!
command.projecte.emc.negative: Cannot remove %1$s EMC from %2$s as this would make their EMC negative.
command.projecte.emc.no_item: Please give an item or tag to change
command.projecte.emc.test.fail: %1$s does not have enough EMC to remove %2$s.
command.projecte.emc.test.success: %1$s does have enough EMC to remove %2$s.
command.projecte.knowledge.clear.fail: %1$s does not have any knowledge to clear.
command.projecte.knowledge.invalid: The item "%1$s" does not  have an EMC value, and cannot be learned.
command.projecte.reload.notice: Restart or use "/reload" when all changes are complete.
configuration.projecte.client.philo_over: The Philosopher's Stone overlay softly pulsates.
configuration.projecte.client.tooltips.e: Requires holding shift to display the EMC value as a tooltip on items and blocks. Note: this does nothing if EMC Tooltips are disabled.
Show the EMC value as a tooltip on items and blocks.
configuration.projecte.client.tooltips.l: Requires holding shift to display the learned/unlearned text as a tooltip on items and blocks. Note: this does nothing if EMC Tooltips are disabled.
configuration.projecte.client.tooltips.p: Show Dark Matter Pedestal functions in item tooltips.
configuration.projecte.client.tooltips.s: Show stats as tooltips for various ProjectE blocks.
configuration.projecte.client.tooltips.t: Show item tags in tooltips (useful for custom EMC registration).
Settings for configuring Tooltips provided by ProjectE.
configuration.projecte.common.crafting.f: Require full omega klein stars in the tome of knowledge and gem armor recipes. This is the same behavior that EE2 had.
configuration.projecte.common.crafting.t: Enable crafting the Tome of Knowledge.
Settings for configuring crafting requirements of specific ProjectE recipes.
configuration.projecte.mapping.dump_to_f: Want to take a look at the internals of EMC Calculation? Enable this to write all the conversions and setValue-Commands to config/ProjectE/mapping_dump.json
configuration.projecte.mapping.log_explo: Logs known EMC Exploits. This can not and will not find all possible exploits. This will only find exploits that result in fixed/custom emc values that the algorithm did not overwrite. Exploits that derive from conversions that are unknown to ProjectE will not be found.
configuration.projecte.mapping.mapper.bl: Set EMC=0 for everything in the c:ores tag.
Set EMC=0 for everything in the c:raw_materials tag.
configuration.projecte.mapping.mapper.cr: Adds conversions for all the different decorated pot combinations.

Fallback for default handling of recipes that extend ICraftingRecipe, AbstractCookingRecipe, SingleItemRecipe, or SmithingRecipe. This will catch modded extensions of the vanilla recipe classes, and if the VanillaRecipeTypes mapper is disabled, this mapper will still catch the vanilla recipes.

This mapper does not actually map anything, but instead just marks recipe classes as having been handled, if we either expose a processor for them, or they are self referencing (for example map cloning recipes).
Propagates shulker box values to colored variants.
Adds conversions for all the different types of suspicious stews.
Add conversions for all lingering potions to arrow recipes.
Add Conversions for Crafting Recipes gathered from net.minecraft.world.item.crafting.RecipeManager
Maps the different vanilla recipe types.
Allows adding custom conversions through CraftTweaker. This behaves similarly to if someone used a custom conversion file instead.
Allows setting EMC values through CraftTweaker. This behaves similarly to if someone used the custom emc file instead.
configuration.projecte.mapping.mapper.cu: Loads json files within datapacks (data/<domain>/pe_custom_conversions/*.json) to add values and conversions.
Uses the `custom_emc.json` File to add EMC values.
configuration.projecte.mapping.mapper.en: Determines whether this EMC Mapper is enabled.
configuration.projecte.mapping.mapper.ox: Add Conversions for all oxidizable blocks.
configuration.projecte.mapping.mapper.re: Determines whether this Recipe Type Mapper is enabled.
configuration.projecte.mapping.mapper.ta: Adds back and forth conversions of objects and their Tag variant. (EMC values assigned to tags will not behave properly if this mapper is disabled)
configuration.projecte.mapping.mapper.to: Used to configure settings for the various EMC Mappers.
configuration.projecte.mapping.mapper.wa: Add Conversions for all waxable blocks
configuration.projecte.mapping.pregenera: When the next EMC mapping occurs write the results to config/ProjectE/pregenerated_emc.json and only ever run the mapping again when that file does not exist, this setting is set to false, or an error occurred parsing that file.
configuration.projecte.mapping.processor: Used to configure settings for the various Data Component Processors.
configuration.projecte.processing.data_c: Calculates EMC value of trimmed armor.
Calculates EMC value of patterned banners.
Calculates EMC value of items stored in bundles.
Calculates EMC value of items stored in vanilla's container component. For example shulker boxes.
Reduces the EMC value the more damaged an item is.
Takes the different sherds into account for each decorated pot.
Calculates EMC value of decorated shield.
The amount (scaled by rarity) to increase EMC value by for enchantments.
Increases the EMC value to take into account any enchantments on an item.
Calculates the EMC value of Firework Stars, based on what was required to craft them.
Increases the EMC value of maps that have had their range extended.
Factors in the EMC value of Klein Stars stored in Mercurial eyes.
Increases the EMC value of the item to take into account any EMC the item has stored.
Allows persisting the contents of writable books. Does not change the EMC value.
Allows persisting the contents of written books. Does not change the EMC value.
configuration.projecte.processing.enable: Determines whether this Data Component Processor is enabled and can adjust the EMC value of items.
configuration.projecte.processing.persis: Determines whether this Data Component Processor can affect the persistent data that gets saved to knowledge/copied in a condenser.
configuration.projecte.server.cooldown.p: Delay between Archangel Smite shooting arrows while in the pedestal.
Delay between Body Stone healing 0.5 shanks while in the pedestal.
Delay between Evertide Amulet trying to start rain while in the pedestal.
Delay between Harvest Goddess trying to grow and harvest while in the pedestal.
Delay between Ignition Ring trying to light entities on fire while in the pedestal.
Delay between Life Stone healing both food and hunger by 0.5 shank/heart while in the pedestal.
Delay between Talisman of Repair trying to repair player items while in the pedestal.
Delay between Soul Stone healing 0.5 hearts while in the pedestal.
Delay between SWRG trying to smite mobs while in the pedestal.
Cooldown settings for various items within Dark Matter Pedestals.
Delay between Volcanite Amulet trying to stop rain while in the pedestal.
Delay between Zero Ring trying to extinguish entities and freezing ground while in the pedestal.
Delay between feed attempts while in a player's inventory. (Body Stone, Life Stone, Gem Helmet).
A cooldown for Gem Chestplate explosion.
Delay between heal attempts while in a player's inventory. (Soul Stone, Life Stone, Gem Helmet).
Delay between Talisman of Repair trying to repair player items while in a player's inventory.
Cooldown settings for various items when being used by a player.
configuration.projecte.server.cooldown.t: Settings for configuring the Cooldown (in ticks) for various features in ProjectE. A cooldown of -1 will disable the functionality. A cooldown of 0 will allow the actions to happen every tick. Use caution as a very low value on features that run automatically could cause TPS issues.
configuration.projecte.server.difficulty: How rounding occurs when Covalence Loss results in a burn value less than 1 EMC. If true the value will be rounded up to 1. If false the value will be rounded down to 0.
Adjusting this ratio changes how much EMC is received when burning a item. For example setting this to 0.5 will return half of the EMC cost.
Amount of damage the Katar's Extra Function deals.
Set to false to disable Gem Armor offensive abilities (helmet zap and chestplate explosion).
Settings for configuring Difficulty options provided by ProjectE.
configuration.projecte.server.effects.in: If true the Interdiction Torch only affects hostile mobs and projectiles. If false it affects all non blacklisted living entities.
configuration.projecte.server.effects.ti: Bonus ticks given by the Watch of Flowing Time while in the pedestal. 0 = effectively no bonus.
Factor the Watch of Flowing Time slows down mobs by while in the pedestal. Set to 1.0 for no slowdown.
configuration.projecte.server.effects.to: Settings for configuring Effect options provided by ProjectE.
configuration.projecte.server.items.disa: If set to true, disables all radius-based mining functionality (right click of tools).
configuration.projecte.server.items.harv: Allows the Harvest Goddess Band to passively grow things like tall grass, flowers, etc, on top of grass blocks and nylium. Also allows it to make moss spread.
configuration.projecte.server.items.op_e: Allow the Evertide amulet to place water in dimensions that water evaporates. For example: The Nether.
configuration.projecte.server.items.pick: Instead of vein mining the ore you right click with your Dark/Red Matter Pick/Star it vein mines all ores in an AOE around you like it did in ProjectE before version 1.4.4.
configuration.projecte.server.items.time: Enables the Watch of Flowing Time.
configuration.projecte.server.items.tool: Settings for configuring Item options provided by ProjectE.
configuration.projecte.server.misc.looki: Shows the EMC value of blocks when looking at them in Jade, TOP, or WTHIT.
configuration.projecte.server.misc.toolt: Settings for configuring misc options provided by ProjectE.
configuration.projecte.server.misc.unsaf: False requires your hand be empty for Gem Armor Offensive Abilities to be readied or triggered.
fml.menu.mods.info.description.projecte: A complete rewrite of EE2 for modern Minecraft versions.
jei.projecte.world_transmute.description: Use item (%1$s) in world, hold %2$s while interacting for alternate output
misc.projecte.high_alchemist_joined: High alchemist %1$s has joined the server
pedestal.projecte.life_stone.2: Half a heart and shank every %1$s
pedestal.projecte.mind_stone: Sucks nearby XP orbs into the Mind Stone
pedestal.projecte.time_watch.1: Gives %1$s bonus ticks to nearby blocks every tick
pedestal.projecte.time_watch.2: Each tick, nearby mobs move %1$s times the speed
pedestal.projecte.tooltip.1: Interact (%1$s) with to insert an item, %2$s to remove.
pedestal.projecte.tooltip.2: Interact (%1$s) with an empty hand to activate!
projecte.configuration.title: ProjectE Config
tooltip.projecte.evertide.1: Press %1$s to fire a water projectile
tooltip.projecte.evertide.2: Acts as an infinite water bucket
tooltip.projecte.evertide.3: Interact with tanks and cauldrons to fill them
tooltip.projecte.gem_density.5: Hold %1$s and interact (%2$s) with the air to toggle
tooltip.projecte.philostone: Press %1$s to open a crafting grid
tooltip.projecte.tome: Unlocks all transmutation knowledge when learned
tooltip.projecte.volcanite.1: Press %1$s to fire a lava projectile
tooltip.projecte.volcanite.2: Acts as infinitely full lava bucket
tooltip.projecte.volcanite.3: Interact with tanks and cauldrons to fill them
